name: Captain Patches and the Quest for Booty
name_original: Captain Patches and the Quest for Booty
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2019. Jam theme: "Only One"

WASD to move, Left Click to interact. Like a standard first person game!

You can also press R to Reset and Escape to Quit.

Art

Lovely Rev

Programming, Design, and Writing

Kai Clavier (That's me!)
